entry.title: Proposed BIP 70 extension
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the inclusion of a numeric memo field in the payment protocol. Some argue that if one cosmetic field is supported, then all fields should be supported with a generic structured data format. Others believe that the textual memo field is already sufficient and that any unnecessary features should be avoided. Jeff Garzik argues that there is nothing wrong with having a numeric memo field as it provides structured data rather than unstructured data. The conversation includes email threads and attachments, including an HTML file and a non-text attachment named smime.p7s.
